items.headline: Project Based, Hands-on Practices, Spark SQL, Spark Streaming, Real life Full cycle Project

Write Spark 2.0 scripts for Transformations, actions, Spark SQL and Spark Streaming
Execute Machine Learning / Data Science algorithms

items.title: Support Vector Machines in Python: SVM Concepts & Code
items.headline: Learn Support Vector Machines in Python. Covers basic SVM models to Kernel-based advanced SVM models of Machine Learning
objectives_summary: Get a solid understanding of Support Vector Machines (SVM)
Understand the business scenarios where Support Vector Machines (SVM) is applicable
Tune a machine learning model's hyperparameters and evaluate its performance.

items.title: Crash course: Data analytics in Python using Pandas
items.headline: Let's get to grips with the Python Pandas library for data analytics / analysis
objectives_summary: Perform data analysis with the Pandas library
Learn about dataframes and how to conduct data analysis in Python
Understand how to handle missing values in your data

items.title: Practical Data Science: Analyzing Stock Market Data with R
items.headline: Learn basic financial technical analysis technics using R (quantmod, TTR) to better understand your favorites stocks.
objectives_summary: Use R on stock market data for insight and ideas
Download free, daily stock market data from Yahoo
Plot great looking financial charts

items.title: Statistics Made Easy by Example for Analytics/ data science

visible_instructors.title: Gopal Prasad Malakar
visible_instructors.name: Gopal Prasad
visible_instructors.job_title: Trains Industry Practices on data science / machine learning

items.headline: Statistics Simplified - Statistics Made Easy by Excel Simulations. Master fundamentals of statistics & Probability.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you should become very comfortable with popular concepts of statistics
You should know the genesis of popular statistical concepts
You should know how you apply it in business problem

items.title: R Programming for Simulation and Monte Carlo Methods
items.headline: Learn to program statistical applications and Monte Carlo simulations with numerous "real-life" cases and R software.
objectives_summary: Use R software to program probabilistic simulations, often called Monte Carlo simulations.
Use R software to program mathematical simulations and to create novel mathematical simulation functions.

Use existing R functions and understand how to write their own R functions to perform simulated inference estimates, including likelihoods and confidence intervals, and to model other cases of stochastic simulation.

items.title: Reinforcement Learning with Pytorch
items.headline: Learn to apply Reinforcement Learning and Artificial Intelligence algorithms using Python, Pytorch and OpenAI Gym
objectives_summary: Reinforcement Learning basics
Tabular methods
Bellman equation

items.title: No Nonsense Python: learn Python basics and start coding
items.headline: Because nobody becomes an expert developer by taking a 30 hour course.
objectives_summary: Python fundamentals. Everything you need to know to get started and nothing you don't!

items.title: Computer Vision Masterclass
items.headline: Learn in practice everything you need to know about Computer Vision! Build projects step by step using Python!
objectives_summary: Understand the basic intuition about Cascade and HOG classifiers to detect faces
Implement face detection using OpenCV and Dlib library
Learn how to detect other objects using OpenCV, such as cars, clocks, eyes, and full body of people

items.title: Learn Data Mining and Machine Learning With Python
items.headline: Learn how to create Machine Learning algorithms in Python and use them in Data Mining
objectives_summary: Learn everything about Data Mining and its applications
Understand Machine Learning and its connection with Data Mining
Learn all Machine Learning algorithms, their types, and their usage in business

items.title: Python and  Data Science  for beginners
items.headline: Learn hands-on data science and Python from scratch
objectives_summary: How to set up environment to explore using Jupyter Notebook
How to import Python Libraries into your environment
How to work with Tabular data

items.title: Forecast Anything with Excel
items.headline: Learn to create your own FORECASTS with just Microsoft Excel: trends, seasonalities, forecast intervals and more!
objectives_summary: Keep your confidential data to yourself ═> Do your own FORECASTS!
Create FORECASTS at confidence levels: 90%, 95%, 99% and more.
Create Graphs showing your FORECASTS for your office Reports.

items.title: Learn R By Intensive Practice
items.headline: Gain clear understanding of base R programming concepts and internalise through a lot of practice
objectives_summary: Do any sort of data manipulation
Create and master the manipulation of vectors, lists, dataframes, and matrices
Write conditional control structures,  debug and efficiently handle errors
